  • Method Details

    • loadWSWRLOntologyFromOntologyDocument

      public WSWRLOntology loadWSWRLOntologyFromOntologyDocument(InputStream inputStream) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException, WSWRLBuiltInException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntologyManager
      Loads a WSWRL ontology from an ontology document obtained from an input stream. The loaded ontology will be assigned an auto-generated document IRI with "inputstream" as its scheme.

      Specified by:
      loadWSWRLOntologyFromOntologyDocument in interface WSWRLOntologyManager
      Parameters:
      inputStream - The input stream used to obtain a representation of an ontology.
      Returns:
      The WSWRL ontology parsed from the input stream.
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyCreationException - If there was a problem in creating and loading the ontology.
      WSWRLBuiltInException
      See Also:
      • OWLOntologyManager.loadOntologyFromOntologyDocument(InputStream)

    • writeInferredAxiomsToOntology

      public void writeInferredAxiomsToOntology(WSWRLOntology wswrlOntology) throws WSWRLBuiltInException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntologyManager
      Write the inferred axioms to a WSWRL ontology. The ontology inferred axioms cached will be cleared.
      Specified by:
      writeInferredAxiomsToOntology in interface WSWRLOntologyManager
      Parameters:
      wswrlOntology - The WSWRL ontology whose axioms must be written.
      Throws:
      WSWRLBuiltInException - If an error occurs while writing a built-in axiom. This exception is forwarded and it originally thrown by WSWRLOntology.processOntology().

    • saveOntologyToTurtle

      public void saveOntologyToTurtle(WSWRLOntology wswrlOntology, String path, float threshold) throws org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException, WSWRLBuiltInException
      Description copied from interface: WSWRLOntologyManager
      Save the ontology in the Turtle format. This method must called WSWRLOntologyManager.writeInferredAxiomsToOntology(WSWRLOntology) to write new axiom to the ontology. Then it may return an OWLOntologyStorageException exception.
      Specified by:
      saveOntologyToTurtle in interface WSWRLOntologyManager
      Parameters:
      wswrlOntology - The WSWRL ontology to save.
      path - The relative path where to save the ontology.
      threshold - The minimum required confidence to keep inferred axioms by WSWRL rules.
      Throws:
      org.semanticweb.owlapi.model.OWLOntologyStorageException - If an error occurs.
      WSWRLBuiltInException - If an error occurs while writing a built-in axiom. This exception is forwarded and it originally thrown by
